type.name: BundleConfig
type.prop: The entry file to bundle. Currently only single files are supported.
Where to save prepared JSX files.
Adds `import { h } from 'preact'` automatically, so that the bundle will be compiled **together** with _Preact_.

Adds `import { h } from '@preact/extern'` automatically, assuming that `preact` will be available in the global scope won't be included in the compilation. It will also rename any `preact` imports into `@externs/preact`, so that the source code stays the same.
